trans-unit.source: Provides properties and instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性和執行個體方法，建立、 複製、 刪除、 移動和開啟檔案，並協助建立<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/fileinfo.cs#4ee673c1a4ecad41).
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽此類型的.NET Framework 原始程式碼，請參閱[參考來源](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/fileinfo.cs#4ee673c1a4ecad41)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> class, which acts as a wrapper for a file path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>類別，做為檔案路徑的包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: You can specify either the fully qualified or the relative file name, but the security check gets the fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定完整或相對的檔名，但安全性檢查會取得完整限定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the new file, or the relative file name.
trans-unit.target: 新的檔案完整的名稱或相對的檔名。

trans-unit.source: Do not end the path with the directory separator character.
trans-unit.target: 未結束的路徑以目錄分隔符號字元。

trans-unit.source: fileName is .
trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The file name is empty, contains only white spaces, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱是空的、 只包含空格，或包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: Access to fileName is denied.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取 fileName 遭到拒絕。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: fileName contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.
trans-unit.target: fileName包含字串的中間的冒號 （:）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> that appends text to the file represented by this instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>，將文字附加至這個執行個體所表示的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamWriter" name="StreamWriter" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamWriter" name="StreamWriter" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file, disallowing the overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 將現有的檔案複製到新的檔案，不允許覆寫現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A> method to allow overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A>方法，以允許覆寫現有的檔案。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Whenever possible, avoid using short file names (such as XXXXXX~1.XXX) with this method.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 盡可能避免使用這個方法的簡短檔案名稱 （例如 XXXXXX~1.XXX)。

trans-unit.source: If two files have equivalent short file names then this method may fail and raise an exception and/or result in undesirable behavior
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個檔案有對等項目簡短檔案名稱，則這個方法可能會失敗並引發例外狀況和/或導致非預期的行為

trans-unit.source: The name of the new file to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製到新的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: A new file with a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 具有完整路徑的新檔案。

trans-unit.source: destFileName is empty, contains only white spaces, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: destFileName是空的、 只包含空格，或包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs, or the destination file already exists.
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤，或已存在目的地檔案。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: destFileName is .
trans-unit.target: destFileNameis .

trans-unit.source: A directory path is passed in, or the file is being moved to a different drive.
trans-unit.target: 傳入目錄路徑，或者檔案正要移至不同的磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified in destFileName does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的目錄 destFileName 不存在。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: destFileName contains a colon (:) within the string but does not specify the volume.
trans-unit.target: destFileName包含在字串中的冒號 （:），但不是指定磁碟區。

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file, allowing the overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 將現有的檔案複製到新的檔案，允許覆寫現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to allow or prevent overwriting of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以允許或防止覆寫現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A> method to prevent overwriting of an existing file by default.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A>以避免覆寫現有檔案的預設方法。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Whenever possible, avoid using short file names (such as XXXXXX~1.XXX) with this method.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 盡可能避免使用這個方法的簡短檔案名稱 （例如 XXXXXX~1.XXX)。

trans-unit.source: If two files have equivalent short file names then this method may fail and raise an exception and/or result in undesirable behavior
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個檔案有對等項目簡短檔案名稱，則這個方法可能會失敗並引發例外狀況和/或導致非預期的行為

trans-unit.source: The name of the new file to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製到新的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow an existing file to be overwritten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要讓現有的檔案會覆寫;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new file, or an overwrite of an existing file if overwrite is .
trans-unit.target: 新的檔案或覆寫現有檔案如果 overwrite 是 。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists and overwrite is , an is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案存在和 overwrite 是 、就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: destFileName is empty, contains only white spaces, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: destFileName是空的、 只包含空格，或包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs, or the destination file already exists and overwrite is .
trans-unit.target: 發生錯誤，或已存在目的地檔案和 overwrite 是 。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: destFileName is .
trans-unit.target: destFileNameis .

trans-unit.source: The directory specified in destFileName does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的目錄 destFileName 不存在。

trans-unit.source: A directory path is passed in, or the file is being moved to a different drive.
trans-unit.target: 傳入目錄路徑，或者檔案正要移至不同的磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: destFileName contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.
trans-unit.target: destFileName包含字串的中間的冒號 （:）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a file.
trans-unit.target: 建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有使用者已授都與至新的檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper for the functionality provided by <xref:System.IO.File.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是<xref:System.IO.File.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.IO.File.Create%2A?displayProperty=fullName>所提供的功能的包裝函式

trans-unit.source: A new file.
trans-unit.target: 新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> that writes a new text file.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>寫入新文字檔。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有使用者已授都與至新的檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamWriter" name="StreamWriter" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamWriter" name="StreamWriter" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file name is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱是一個目錄。

trans-unit.source: The disk is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 磁碟處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt*> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密目前帳戶使用加密檔案<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt*>方法。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt*>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法可讓您將使用加密檔案解密<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法可以解密使用目前的使用者帳戶已加密的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A> method and the Decrypt method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>和解密方法使用電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檔案系統必須格式化為 NTFS，且目前的作業系統必須 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: An invalid drive was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了無效的磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The file system is not NTFS.
trans-unit.target: 檔案系統不是 NTFS。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or- This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: -或者-目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Permanently deletes a file.
trans-unit.target: 永久刪除的檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The target file is open or memory-mapped on a computer running Microsoft Windows NT.
trans-unit.target: 開啟或執行 Microsoft Windows NT 的電腦上記憶體對應檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is an open handle on the file, and the operating system is Windows XP or earlier.
trans-unit.target: -或-開啟的控制代碼上的檔案，而且作業系統是 Windows XP 或更早版本。

trans-unit.source: This open handle can result from enumerating directories and files.
trans-unit.target: 這個開啟控制代碼可能是因為列舉目錄和檔案。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Enumerate Directories and Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 列舉目錄和檔案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The path is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 路徑是目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得父目錄的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To get the parent directory as a string, use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.DirectoryName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得以字串形式的父目錄，請使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.DirectoryName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.DirectoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> object representing the parent directory of this file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"> </xref>物件，代表這個檔案的上層目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representing the directory's full path.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目錄的完整路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: To get the parent directory as a <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> object, use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Directory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的父目錄<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>物件，請使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Directory%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Directory%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>

trans-unit.source: When first called, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫時，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>和快取檔案的相關資訊。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在後續呼叫中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>取得資訊的最新的複本。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the directory's full path.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示目錄的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> was passed in for the directory name.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>傳入的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path is 260 or more characters.
trans-unit.target: 完整的路徑為 260 或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 加密檔案，只有使用加密檔案的帳戶才能將其解密。

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 加密方法可讓您加密檔案，以便只有呼叫這個方法所使用的帳戶才能將其解密。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method to decrypt a file encrypted by the Encrypt method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法來解密加密的加密方法的檔案。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both the Encrypt method and the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A> method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種加密方法和<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>方法使用的電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.Decrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檔案系統必須格式化為 NTFS，且目前的作業系統必須 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: An invalid drive was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了無效的磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The file system is not NTFS.
trans-unit.target: 檔案系統不是 NTFS。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: -or- This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: -或者-目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a file exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: When first called, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫時，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>和快取檔案的相關資訊。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在後續呼叫中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>取得資訊的最新的複本。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Exists property returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: Exists 屬性會傳回`false`如果發生任何錯誤時嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多的字元，失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the file exists; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the file does not exist or if the file is a directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果檔案存在。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果檔案不存在，或如果檔案是目錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for the file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>物件會封裝目前所描述的檔案存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetAccessControl method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetAccessControl 方法來擷取目前的檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the access control rules for the current file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"> </xref>封裝目前檔案的存取控制規則的物件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The current system account does not have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 目前的系統帳戶沒有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the specified type of access control list (ACL) entries for the file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>封裝的目前所描述之檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目之指定的類型的物件<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetAccessControl method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for the current file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetAccessControl 方法來擷取目前的檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> values that specifies which group of access control entries to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>值，指定哪些群組的存取控制擷取的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the access control rules for the current file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"> </xref>封裝目前檔案的存取控制規則的物件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The current system account does not have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 目前的系統帳戶沒有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the current file is read only.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷目前檔案是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsReadOnly property to quickly determine or change whether the current file is read only.
trans-unit.target: IsReadOnly 屬性用於快速判斷或變更是否目前檔案為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: When first called, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫時，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>和快取檔案的相關資訊。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在後續呼叫中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>取得資訊的最新的複本。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current file is read only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前檔案為唯讀。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: -或者-呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The user does not have write permission, but attempted to set this property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者沒有寫入權限，但嘗試將此屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bytes, of the current file.
trans-unit.target: 取得大小，以位元組為單位，目前的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Length property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Length 屬性的值時，預先快取的目前執行個體<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件已從下列任何一個傳回<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>方法:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>-<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>若要取得最新的值，呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: The size of the current file in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檔案，以位元組為單位的大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot update the state of the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>無法更新檔案或目錄的狀態。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 檔案不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Length" name="Length" href=""></xref> property is called for a directory.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref uid="langword_csharp_Length" name="Length" href=""> </xref>屬性稱為目錄。

trans-unit.source: Moves a specified file to a new location, providing the option to specify a new file name.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案移至新的位置，並提供指定新的檔案名稱的選項。

trans-unit.source: This method works across disk volumes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法適用於跨磁碟區。

trans-unit.source: For example, the file c:\MyFile.txt can be moved to d:\public and renamed NewFile.txt.
trans-unit.target: 例如，檔案 c:\MyFile.txt 可以移至 d:\public 和重新命名 NewFile.txt。

trans-unit.source: The path to move the file to, which can specify a different file name.
trans-unit.target: 路徑移動檔案，可以指定不同的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs, such as the destination file already exists or the destination device is not ready.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如目的檔案已經存在，或目的地裝置尚未就緒。

trans-unit.source: destFileName is .
trans-unit.target: destFileNameis .

trans-unit.source: destFileName is empty, contains only white spaces, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: destFileName是空的、 只包含空格，或包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: destFileName is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: destFileName是唯讀或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: destFileName contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.
trans-unit.target: destFileName包含字串的中間的冒號 （:）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file.
trans-unit.target: 取得檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When first called, <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> calls <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> and caches information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 第一次呼叫時，<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>和快取檔案的相關資訊。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, you must call <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> to get the latest copy of the information.
trans-unit.target: 在後續呼叫中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>取得資訊的最新的複本。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file includes the file extension.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱包含副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Opens a file in the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 以指定模式開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> constant specifying the mode (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Open" name="Open" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""></xref>) in which to open the file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"> </xref>常數，指定的模式 (例如， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Open" name="Open" href=""> </xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""> </xref>)，以開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: A file opened in the specified mode, with read/write access and unshared.
trans-unit.target: 一個檔案中指定的模式，以讀取/寫入存取開啟，且不共用。

trans-unit.source: The file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案是唯讀，或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The file is already open.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已經開啟。

trans-unit.source: Opens a file in the specified mode with read, write, or read/write access.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案中指定的模式和讀取、 寫入或讀取/寫入存取。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> constant specifying the mode (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Open" name="Open" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""></xref>) in which to open the file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"> </xref>常數，指定的模式 (例如， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Open" name="Open" href=""> </xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""> </xref>)，以開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref> constant specifying whether to open the file with <xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Write" name="Write" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadWrite" name="ReadWrite" href=""></xref> file access.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"> </xref>常數，指定是否要開啟副檔名為<xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Write" name="Write" href=""> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadWrite" name="ReadWrite" href=""></xref>檔案存取。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> object opened in the specified mode and access, and unshared.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"> </xref>開啟於指定的模式和存取，且為不共用的物件。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: path is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: path是唯讀或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The file is already open.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已經開啟。

trans-unit.source: Opens a file in the specified mode with read, write, or read/write access and the specified sharing option.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入或讀取/寫入存取和指定的共用選項與指定的模式中開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref> constant specifying the mode (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Open" name="Open" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""></xref>) in which to open the file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileMode"> </xref>常數，指定的模式 (例如， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Open" name="Open" href=""> </xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""> </xref>)，以開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref> constant specifying whether to open the file with <xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Write" name="Write" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadWrite" name="ReadWrite" href=""></xref> file access.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"> </xref>常數，指定是否要開啟副檔名為<xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Write" name="Write" href=""> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadWrite" name="ReadWrite" href=""></xref>檔案存取。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileShare"></xref> constant specifying the type of access other <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileStream" name="FileStream" href=""></xref> objects have to this file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileShare"> </xref>常數，指定的型別存取其他<xref uid="langword_csharp_FileStream" name="FileStream" href=""></xref>物件對這個檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> object opened with the specified mode, access, and sharing options.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"> </xref>物件開啟與指定的模式、 存取和共用選項。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: path is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: path是唯讀或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The file is already open.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已經開啟。

trans-unit.source: Creates a read-only <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立唯讀<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a read-only <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object with the <xref:System.IO.FileShare> mode set to <xref:System.IO.FileShare>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回唯讀<xref:System.IO.FileStream><xref:System.IO.FileShare>模式設定為<xref:System.IO.FileShare>.</xref:System.IO.FileShare></xref:System.IO.FileShare>物件</xref:System.IO.FileStream>

trans-unit.source: A new read-only <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新唯讀<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: path is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: path是唯讀或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The file is already open.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已經開啟。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> with UTF8 encoding that reads from an existing text file.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>具有 UTF8 編碼方式，可從現有文字檔讀取。</xref:System.IO.StreamReader>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamReader" name="StreamReader" href=""></xref> with UTF8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamReader" name="StreamReader" href=""></xref>具有 UTF8 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: path is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: path是唯讀或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: Creates a write-only <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立唯寫<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The OpenWrite method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: OpenWrite 方法開啟的檔案，其中一個已存在的檔案路徑，或如果不存在的話，會建立新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 現有的檔案，它不會將新的文字附加至現有的文字。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會覆寫現有的字元與新的字元。

trans-unit.source: If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (like "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method").
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫較長的字串 （例如，"This is OpenWrite 方法的測試)"使用較短的字串 （例如 [第二個執行]），檔案會包含字串的混合 (「 第二個 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。

trans-unit.source: A write-only unshared <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> object for a new or existing file.
trans-unit.target: 唯寫非共用<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>新的或現有的檔案物件。

trans-unit.source: The path specified when creating an instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object is read-only or is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體時指定的路徑<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件是唯讀或為目錄。

trans-unit.source: The path specified when creating an instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體時指定的路徑<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案，取代指定檔案的內容<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件，刪除原始檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The Replace method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of the file described by the current <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法目前所描述之檔案的內容，取代指定檔案的內容<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it returns a new <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object that describes the overwritten file.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會傳回新<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>描述覆寫的檔案的物件。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This method will succeed in Windows 2000 environments if the `destFileName` is read-only and will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 如果，這個方法會在 Windows 2000 環境中成功`destFileName`處於唯讀狀態，並將不會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check if the destination file is read-only before attempting to replace it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性來檢查目的地檔案是否為唯讀，然後再嘗試將取代它。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`null`至`destBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file to replace with the current file.
trans-unit.target: 要使用目前檔案取代之檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file with which to create a backup of the file described by the `destFileName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立所描述之檔案的備份檔案的名稱`destFileName`參數。

trans-unit.source: A object that encapsulates information about the file described by the destFileName parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 封裝所描述之檔案的相關資訊的物件 destFileName 參數。

trans-unit.source: The path described by the destFileName parameter was not of a legal form.
trans-unit.target: 描述的路徑 destFileName 參數不是合法的表單。

trans-unit.source: -or- The path described by the destBackupFileName parameter was not of a legal form.
trans-unit.target: -描述的路徑 destBackupFileName 參數不是合法的表單。

trans-unit.source: The destFileName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The destFileName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: -or- The file described by the destinationFileName parameter could not be found.
trans-unit.target: -所描述的檔案 destinationFileName 找不到參數。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案，取代指定檔案的內容<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件，刪除原始檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: Also specifies whether to ignore merge errors.
trans-unit.target: 也會指定是否忽略合併錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The Replace method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of the file described by the current <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法目前所描述之檔案的內容，取代指定檔案的內容<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it returns a new <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object that describes the overwritten file.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會傳回新<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>描述覆寫的檔案的物件。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This method will succeed in Windows 2000 environments if the `destFileName` is read-only and will not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 如果，這個方法會在 Windows 2000 環境中成功`destFileName`處於唯讀狀態，並將不會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check if the destination file is read-only before attempting to replace it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性來檢查目的地檔案是否為唯讀，然後再嘗試將取代它。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`null`至`destBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file to replace with the current file.
trans-unit.target: 要使用目前檔案取代之檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file with which to create a backup of the file described by the `destFileName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立所描述之檔案的備份檔案的名稱`destFileName`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore merge errors (such as attributes and ACLs) from the replaced file to the replacement file; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要取代檔案忽略合併錯誤 （例如屬性和 Acl），取代檔案否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A object that encapsulates information about the file described by the destFileName parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 封裝所描述之檔案的相關資訊的物件 destFileName 參數。

trans-unit.source: The path described by the destFileName parameter was not of a legal form.
trans-unit.target: 描述的路徑 destFileName 參數不是合法的表單。

trans-unit.source: -or- The path described by the destBackupFileName parameter was not of a legal form.
trans-unit.target: -描述的路徑 destBackupFileName 參數不是合法的表單。

trans-unit.source: The destFileName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The destFileName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 目前所描述的檔案<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>找不到物件。

trans-unit.source: -or- The file described by the destinationFileName parameter could not be found.
trans-unit.target: -所描述的檔案 destinationFileName 找不到參數。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object to the file described by the current <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>目前所描述之檔案的物件<xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method applies access control list (ACL) entries to the current file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: SetAccessControl 方法套用至目前的檔案，表示 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the SetAccessControl method whenever you need to add or remove ACL entries from a file.
trans-unit.target: 每當您需要新增或移除檔案的 ACL 項目，請使用 SetAccessControl 方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > ACL 指定`fileSecurity`參數已取代現有檔案的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use SetAccessControl to apply it back to the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL、 修改它，然後使用 SetAccessControl 來套用該備份檔案。</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: 只保存 SetAccessControl 方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件建立後已修改的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不可以擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>從原始程式檔的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>目的地檔案的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>來源方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to the destination file using the SetAccessControl method.
trans-unit.target: 設定目的地<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>使用 SetAccessControl 方法的目的檔案的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that describes an access control list (ACL) entry to apply to the current file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"> </xref>物件，描述要套用至目前檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: The fileSecurity parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The fileSecurity parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found or modified.
trans-unit.target: 找不到或無法修改檔案。

trans-unit.source: The current process does not have access to open the file.
trans-unit.target: 目前的處理序沒有開啟檔案的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Microsoft Windows 2000 or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的作業系統不是 Microsoft Windows 2000 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path as a string.
trans-unit.target: 將路徑當做字串傳回。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the ToString method represents path that was passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法所傳回的字串表示傳遞給建構函式的路徑。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object using the constructors, the ToString method returns the fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件使用建構函式，ToString 方法會傳回完整路徑。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: However, there are cases where the string returned by the ToString method does not represent the fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有些情況是 ToString 方法所傳回的字串不是完整的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you create a <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object using the <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> method, the ToString method does not represent the fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您建立的<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>物件使用的<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>方法，ToString 方法不是完整路徑。</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path.
trans-unit.target: 表示路徑的字串。
